description.zh-cn: 中国女子篮球运动员、教练及体育官员，荣获“新中国50年篮球50杰”称号。曾任辽宁省体育局副局长。
description.en: A Chinese female basketball player, coach, and sports official, honored as one of the '50 Greatest Basketball Players in New China'. She formerly served as the Deputy Director of the Liaoning Provincial Sports Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Liaoning province, China.

nodes.id: 中国国家女子青年篮球队

zh-cn: 中国国家女子青年篮球队

description.zh-cn: 代表中国参加国际青年女子篮球比赛的国家队。
description.en: The national team that represents China in international youth women's basketball competitions.

description.zh-cn: 一支中国女子篮球联赛（WCBA）的职业篮球队，主场位于辽宁省。
description.en: A professional basketball team in the Women's Chinese Basketball Association (WCBA), based in Liaoning province.

description.zh-cn: 代表中国参加国际女子篮球比赛的国家队。
description.en: The national team that represents China in international women's basketball competitions.

description.zh-cn: 中国女子篮球运动员，与王芳在中国国家队是队友。
description.en: A Chinese female basketball player and a teammate of Wang Fang on the Chinese national team.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚篮球教练，曾任中国国家女子篮球队主教练。
description.en: An Australian basketball coach who formerly served as the head coach of the China women's national basketball team.

nodes.id: 辽宁省篮球运动管理中心

zh-cn: 辽宁省篮球运动管理中心

description.zh-cn: 负责管理辽宁省篮球运动的政府机构。
description.en: A government agency responsible for the administration of basketball in Liaoning province.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球教练，在王芳辞职后接任辽宁女篮主教练。
description.en: A Chinese basketball coach who took over as the head coach of the Liaoning women's team after Wang Fang's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 一支中国男子篮球职业联赛（CBA）的职业篮球队，主场位于辽宁省。
description.en: A professional basketball team in the Chinese Basketball Association (CBA), based in Liaoning province.

nodes.id: 中国男子篮球职业联赛

zh-cn: 中国男子篮球职业联赛

description.zh-cn: 中国的顶级职业男子篮球联赛。
description.en: The top-tier professional men's basketball league in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省负责体育事务的政府部门。
description.en: The government department responsible for sports affairs in Liaoning province, China.

description.zh-cn: 王芳的父亲，曾是辽宁篮球队运动员。
description.en: Father of Wang Fang, former basketball player for a Liaoning team.

description.zh-cn: 王芳的弟弟，曾是辽宁篮球队运动员。
description.en: Brother of Wang Fang, former basketball player for a Liaoning team.

description.zh-cn: 王芳的丈夫，原中国国家青年篮球队队员。
description.en: Husband of Wang Fang, former member of the Chinese National Youth Basketball Team.

description.zh-cn: 王芳的弟媳，蒋兴权之女，曾是辽宁女子篮球队运动员。
description.en: Sister-in-law of Wang Fang, daughter of Jiang Xingquan, and a former player for the Liaoning women's basketball team.

description.zh-cn: 中国篮球教练，女儿蒋旭是王芳的弟媳。
description.en: A Chinese basketball coach, whose daughter Jiang Xu is Wang Fang's sister-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 王芳与张岩的儿子，效力于CBA辽宁男篮俱乐部。
description.en: Son of Wang Fang and Zhang Yan, plays for the Liaoning Flying Leopards in the CBA.

nodes.id: 新中国篮球运动杰出贡献奖

zh-cn: 新中国篮球运动杰出贡献奖

description.zh-cn: 为表彰中华人民共和国成立50年来为篮球运动作出杰出贡献的个人而设立的荣誉称号，获奖者共50人。
description.en: An honorary title established to recognize 50 individuals who made outstanding contributions to the sport of basketball in the first 50 years of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国国家女子青年篮球队

description.zh-cn: 1984年，王芳入选中国国青女篮队。
description.en: In 1984, Wang Fang was selected for the Chinese National Youth Women's Basketball Team.

description.zh-cn: 1985年入选辽宁女篮一线队担任队员。退役后，于2000年出任主教练，并在2008-2010年再次担任主教练，率队夺得2008-09赛季WCBA总冠军。
description.en: Selected for the Liaoning women's first team as a player in 1985. After retiring, she became the head coach in 2000 and served again from 2008 to 2010, leading the team to the WCBA championship in the 2008-09 season.

description.zh-cn: 1987年入选国家队担任队员，随队获得1992年奥运会和1994年世锦赛银牌。2005年进入国家队教练组担任助理教练，帮助球队在2008年北京奥运会打进四强。
description.en: Selected for the national team as a player in 1987, winning silver medals at the 1992 Olympics and the 1994 World Championship. Joined the national team's coaching staff as an assistant coach in 2005, helping the team reach the semi-finals at the 2008 Beijing Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国国家女子篮球队队员，与郑海霞共同参赛，并在1994年世锦赛上分别作为球队的二号和一号得分手，帮助球队获得银牌。
description.en: As players of the Chinese women's national basketball team, she competed alongside Zheng Haixia. In the 1994 World Championship, they were the team's second and first top scorers, respectively, helping the team win a silver medal.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，王芳在中国国家女篮队担任主教练汤姆·马赫的助理教练。
description.en: In 2005, Wang Fang served as an assistant coach to head coach Tom Maher in the Chinese women's national basketball team.

description.zh-cn: 2010年，王芳因出任行政职务而辞去辽宁女篮主教练一职，由李光琦接任。
description.en: In 2010, Wang Fang resigned as head coach of the Liaoning women's team to take an administrative position, and was succeeded by Li Guangqi.

relationships.target: 辽宁省篮球运动管理中心

description.zh-cn: 2010年出任辽宁省篮球运动管理中心副主任，后升任主任。
description.en: Appointed as Deputy Director of the Liaoning Provincial Basketball Administration Center in 2010, and was later promoted to Director.

description.zh-cn: 在王芳担任辽宁篮管中心主任期间，辽宁男篮于2018年首次夺得CBA总冠军。
description.en: During Wang Fang's tenure as Director of the Liaoning Basketball Administration Center, the Liaoning men's team won its first CBA championship in 2018.

position.en: Party Leadership Group Member, Deputy Director

description.zh-cn: 2018年8月，王芳升任辽宁省体育局党组成员、副局长。
description.en: In August 2018, Wang Fang was promoted to Party Leadership Group Member and Deputy Director of the Liaoning Provincial Sports Bureau.

relationships.target: 新中国篮球运动杰出贡献奖

description.zh-cn: 王芳是“新中国50年篮球50杰”荣誉的获得者之一。
description.en: Wang Fang is one of the recipients of the '50 Greatest Basketball Players in New China' honor.

description.zh-cn: 张镇麟效力于CBA的辽宁男篮俱乐部。
description.en: Zhang Zhenlin plays for the Liaoning Flying Leopards club in the CBA.
